title: Failed to Join queue?
body: So I tried to look for a solo ranked game, and it told me that I "failed to join queue. After this I tried again and it put me in queue and when I accepted champion select was just back, and I had the same loading sign you briefly get before you connect to champ select. I left because I couldn't do anything and I think it processed as a leave and I lost the usual amount of lp and have to wait 5 minutes. I've had quite a few people dodging ranked today, so is there a chance this has happened to anyone else? I don't really mind the lp loss, I'm just wondering why this happened and if it's happening to others too. Thanks :)
